function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Encouragement of remote working and digital twins may lead to reduced physical interaction, impacting social and professional dynamics.","category":"Social and Professional Dynamics","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and crowd control","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public education campaigns leading to the spread of disinformation and misinformation about diseases.","category":"Disinformation and sanitation, and waste management systems in slum areas, increasing the threat of pandemic spread.","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different sign types informal vs. professional","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines during the delivery of goods and basic satisfaction with floor area","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of immediate threat perception","category":"Health Behaviors and
